verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8761><s%> ye the YY <S%H3050><s%>. Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H376><s%> that feareth <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, that delighteth <S%H2654><s%> <S%H8804><s%> greatly <S%H3966><s%> in his Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>.
His seed <S%H2233><s%> shall be mighty <S%H1368><s%> upon earth <S%H776><s%>: the generation <S%H1755><s%> of the upright <S%H3477><s%> shall be blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8792><s%>.
Wealth <S%H1952><s%> and riches <S%H6239><s%> shall be in his house <S%H1004><s%>: and his righteousness <S%H6666><s%> endureth <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8802><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%>.

Unto the upright <S%H3477><s%> there ariseht <S%H2224><s%> <S%H8804><s%> light <S%H216><s%> in the darkness <S%H2822><s%>: he is gracious <S%H2587><s%>, and full of compassion <S%H7349><s%>, and righteous <S%H6662><s%>.

A good <S%H2896><s%> man <S%H376><s%> sheweth favour <S%H2603><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and lendeth <S%H3867><s%> <S%H8688><s%>: he will guide <S%H3557><s%> <S%H8770><s%> his affairs <S%H1697><s%> with discretion <S%H4941><s%>.
Surely he shall not be moved <S%H4131><s%> <S%H8735><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>: the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall be in everlasting <S%H5769><s%> remembrance <S%H2143><s%>.

He shall not be afraid <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of evil <S%H7451><s%> tidings <S%H8052><s%>: his heart <S%H3820><s%> is fixed <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8737><s%>, trusting <S%H982><s%> <S%H8803><s%> in the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

His heart <S%H3820><s%> is established <S%H5564><s%> <S%H8803><s%>, he shall not be afraid <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, until he see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his desire upon his enemies <S%H6862><s%>.

He hath dispersed <S%H6340><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, he hath given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to the poor <S%H34><s%>; his righteousness <S%H6666><s%> endureth <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8802><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%>; his shofar <S%H7161><s%> shall be exalted <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with honour <S%H3519><s%>.

The wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it, and be grieved <S%H3707><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; he shall gnash <S%H2786><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with his teeth <S%H8127><s%>, and melt away <S%H4549><s%> <S%H8738><s%>: the desire <S%H8378><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall perish <S%H6><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
